shove.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to push someone or something in a rough or careless way, using your hands or shoulders
shove.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He shoved her towards the car.
Everyone was pushing and shoving to see the prince.
shove.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to put something somewhere carelessly or without thinking much
shove.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Tidying the room seems to mean shoving everything under the bed!
He shoved his hands into his pockets.
shove.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: used to tell someone in a very impolite way that you do not want something
shove.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: They can take their three cents an hour raise and shove it.
shove.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Give the door a good shove.
